Articles.Content:
That was me... and then the great server crash happened. I guess it's a chance for me to start over though. I never did put up one of these hello posts, probably because the only people who ever read/reply to them are the mods, but I need to fill out my first 5 posts so I can actually participate in real discussions in other forums.

Also, I like going to space.
I do not remember NascgiGale, but it sounds like a really cool forum name, glad to meet your 'reincarnation'.

Welcome back to the forums!

Make sure you stop by the Drawing Board (link in my sig) on your way back to your former glory. We've been trying to rebuild the tutorial section, and I've been doing my part.

Happy landings!
